name: averagely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is considered typical or usual: He's an averagely attractive man. She enjoyed an averagely successful career as a model. See
average
More examplesFewer examples"Middle class" describes people who are averagely well-off.When I first met him he was just an averagely quiet, fairly intelligent boy.Most biathletes have a resting heart-rate less than half that of an averagely healthy adult.
